meanings.sent1: The small, dangered kitten cautiously approached the loud dog.
meanings.sent2: The hikers were warned to stay away from the dangered cliff edge.
meanings.sent3: The dangered squirrel tried to hide from the approaching storm.
meanings.sent4: The fragile bridge swayed in the wind, dangered by the weight of the heavy truck.
meanings.sent5: The lone flower stood dangered in the path of the lawnmower.

meanings.definition: Put at risk of harm or injury.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter dangered his life to save the trapped cat from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: Leaving the door unlocked dangered the safety of the house.
meanings.sent3: She playfully dangered her brother by pretending to throw his favorite toy in the pool.
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior dangered the success of the entire project.
meanings.sent5: The decision to skip safety checks dangered the lives of everyone on board.
